[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [Geometry](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometry.md)

## Geometry interface

Structured clone compliant version of a `three.js` geometry object, consisting of buffers with metadata for map features and objects for example roads, trees or parks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Geometry 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |

|  [featureStarts](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometry.featurestarts.md) | number\[\] | Optional sorted list of feature start indices. The indices point into the index attribute. Feature i starts at featureStarts\[i\] and ends at featureStarts\[i+1\]-1, except for the last feature, which ends at index\[index.length-1\]. |
